document.full_text: rosneft  will pull out of its proposed strategic alliance with bp  and launch a search for new partners to explore the arctic kara sea blocks, a source close to the company said on tuesday.
document.title: rosneft to drop bp, seek arctic partners: source
lines_and_colors: rosneft  will pull out of its proposed strategic alliance with bp  and launch a search for new partners to explore the arctic kara sea blocks, a source close to the company said on tuesday.
